meanings.sent1: The doctor will reinoculate the patient to keep them healthy.

meanings.definition: To introduce a new inoculum into a previously inoculated individual.
meanings.sent1: The scientist will reinoculate the lab mice with a stronger dose.
meanings.sent2: It is common practice to reinoculate individuals in high-risk areas.
meanings.sent3: The farmer decided to reinoculate the chickens with a special vaccine.
meanings.sent4: Just like upgrading armor, you need to reinoculate the body's defenses.
meanings.sent5: To boost immunity, the doctor will reinoculate the patient with a different vaccine.
